sentences.en: His familiarization with several operating system make him the best candidate for this position.
sentences.cn: 由于熟悉好几种操作系统,他成了这个职位的最佳候选人.

sentences.en: Participates in product design meetings for familiarization with project requirements and objectives.
sentences.cn: 参与产品设计会议以熟悉工程项目的需要和目标.

sentences.en: Stability and usability were influenced by the optimization and the familiarization of teachers and pupils.
sentences.cn: 稳定性及易用性受最佳化及师生熟悉度影响.

sentences.en: The familiarization with psychological features of young students may impose great impact on mind education effect.
sentences.cn: 掌握青年学生心理特点对思想教育成效影响很大.

sentences.en: The trip was to inspect and get familiarization with the machinery being produced by Pratt & Whitney .
sentences.cn: 监造新枪厂的机器生产并熟悉机器 操作程序.

words.tran_cn: 不拘礼节地；亲密地；精通地
